title: Thanks Riot for the LP loss.

replies.body: Dude, that's your router cracking the shit's.

> [{quoted}](name=Chicken4dinner,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=5U4RwtJR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-13T06:38:22.141+0000)
>
> Dude, that's your router cracking the shit's.

Nah, it was Riot's servers.
